product_profile.target_users: 希望通过AI拍照识别食物来轻松追踪卡路里、管理体重的健身减肥人群
product_profile.core_value: 用AI扫描食物自动识别营养成分，让卡路里追踪变得简单高效

core_function.cn: 展示品牌Logo和名称，建立品牌认知
core_function.en: Display brand logo and name, establish brand recognition

design_highlights.cn: 极简设计，纯白背景突出品牌标识
design_highlights.en: Minimalist design with pure white background highlighting brand identity

design_highlights.cn: 苹果图标巧妙传达卡路里/营养主题
design_highlights.en: Apple icon cleverly conveys calorie/nutrition theme

design_highlights.cn: Cal AI命名传递智能科技感
design_highlights.en: Cal AI naming conveys smart technology feel

product_insight.cn: 启动页采用极简风格，苹果图标与Cal AI名称结合，直观传达产品是AI驱动的卡路里追踪工具，建立专业可信的第一印象
product_insight.en: Launch screen uses minimalist style, apple icon combined with Cal AI name intuitively conveys AI-driven calorie tracking tool, establishing professional and trustworthy first impression

Screen_002.png.description_cn: 卡路里追踪价值主张展示页面
Screen_002.png.description_en: Calorie tracking value proposition display page

core_function.cn: 展示AI拍照追踪卡路里的核心价值主张
core_function.en: Showcase AI photo-based calorie tracking value proposition

design_highlights.cn: 真机展示食物扫描界面，直观呈现产品功能
design_highlights.en: Real device mockup showing food scanning interface

design_highlights.cn: 扫描框动态聚焦食物，暗示AI识别能力
design_highlights.en: Scan frame focusing on food suggests AI recognition

design_highlights.cn: "made easy"文案降低用户心理门槛
design_highlights.en: "Made easy" copy reduces user anxiety

design_highlights.cn: 醒目的Get Started按钮引导下一步
design_highlights.en: Prominent Get Started CTA guides next step

product_insight.cn: 通过展示实际食物扫描场景，让用户立即理解产品核心功能，同时"轻松追踪"的承诺直击用户痛点——传统卡路里记录太繁琐
product_insight.en: Showing actual food scanning scenario helps users instantly understand core feature, while 'made easy' promise addresses user pain point of tedious traditional calorie logging

Screen_003.png.description_cn: 收集用户出生日期信息

core_function.cn: 收集用户出生日期以计算年龄，用于定制个性化健康计划
core_function.en: Collect user birthdate to calculate age for personalized health plan

design_highlights.cn: 三列滚轮选择器设计简洁直观，高亮当前选中项
design_highlights.en: Three-column wheel picker with highlighted current selection

design_highlights.cn: iOS原生滚轮交互符合用户习惯，操作流畅
design_highlights.en: Native iOS wheel picker provides familiar and smooth interaction

design_highlights.cn: 说明用途'calibrate your custom plan'增强信任感
design_highlights.en: Purpose explanation builds trust with users

product_insight.cn: 出生日期是计算基础代谢率(BMR)的关键因素，年龄直接影响每日热量需求。将用途透明化展示，降低用户对隐私数据收集的顾虑。
product_insight.en: Birthdate is crucial for BMR calculation as age directly affects daily calorie needs. Transparent purpose display reduces privacy concerns about data collection.

core_function.cn: 收集用户性别信息以校准个性化方案
core_function.en: Collect gender to calibrate personalized plan

design_highlights.cn: 极简黑白配色，选中态清晰醒目
design_highlights.en: Minimalist black-white palette with clear selected state

design_highlights.cn: 单选卡片式设计，操作简单直观
design_highlights.en: Single-select card design, simple and intuitive

design_highlights.cn: 包含Other选项体现包容性设计
design_highlights.en: Other option shows inclusive design approach

product_insight.cn: 性别作为第一个信息收集步骤，因其对卡路里计算和代谢率有直接影响，同时提供Other选项体现产品对多元性别的尊重
product_insight.en: Gender as first data point directly impacts calorie calculation and metabolism; Other option demonstrates respect for gender diversity

Screen_005.png.description_cn: 收集用户每周锻炼频率偏好
Screen_005.png.description_en: Collect user's weekly workout frequency preference

core_function.cn: 收集用户每周运动频率以校准个性化健身计划
core_function.en: Collect weekly workout frequency to calibrate custom fitness plan

design_highlights.cn: 图标化选项区分度高，黑白配色简约专业
design_highlights.en: Iconized options with high distinction, minimalist black-white scheme

design_highlights.cn: 单选卡片式设计，选中状态反转色清晰醒目
design_highlights.en: Single-select card design with inverted color for clear selection state

design_highlights.cn: 描述文案亲和无压力，如'workouts now and then'降低用户心理负担
design_highlights.en: Friendly copy like 'workouts now and then' reduces user pressure

product_insight.cn: 运动频率是计算TDEE和制定饮食计划的关键参数，三档分级设计简化用户决策，同时覆盖从久坐到运动达人的全部用户群体
product_insight.en: Workout frequency is key for TDEE calculation and meal planning. Three-tier design simplifies decisions while covering all users from sedentary to athletes

Screen_006.png.description_cn: 收集用户获知应用的渠道来源

core_function.cn: 收集用户了解产品的渠道来源，优化营销投放
core_function.en: Collect user acquisition channel data for marketing optimization

design_highlights.cn: 各平台品牌图标清晰识别，增强选项辨识度
design_highlights.en: Clear platform brand icons enhance option recognition

design_highlights.cn: 单选卡片式设计，选中状态反色突出
design_highlights.en: Single-select card design with inverted highlight on selection

design_highlights.cn: 低门槛问题降低用户心理负担
design_highlights.en: Low-barrier question reduces user cognitive load

product_insight.cn: 通过渠道来源调研帮助产品团队了解获客效果，同时因为问题简单不涉及隐私，能保持用户填写意愿，是onboarding中常见的归因收集环节
product_insight.en: Channel survey helps track acquisition effectiveness while maintaining user engagement through non-intrusive questioning, a common attribution collection step in onboarding

Screen_007.png.description_cn: 询问用户是否使用过其他卡路里追踪应用
Screen_007.png.description_en: Asking if user has tried other calorie tracking apps

core_function.cn: 了解用户是否有卡路里追踪App使用经验
core_function.en: Survey user's prior experience with calorie tracking apps

design_highlights.cn: 高对比度选项卡设计，选中态清晰明确
design_highlights.en: High contrast option cards with clear selection state

design_highlights.cn: 简洁二选一设计降低用户决策负担
design_highlights.en: Simple binary choice reduces decision burden

design_highlights.cn: emoji图标增添亲和力和趣味性
design_highlights.en: Emoji icons add friendliness and fun

product_insight.cn: 通过了解用户过往经历，产品可以判断用户熟悉度，为新手提供更详细引导，为老用户简化流程，实现差异化体验
product_insight.en: Understanding prior experience helps tailor onboarding depth - detailed guidance for newcomers, streamlined flow for experienced users

Screen_008.png.description_cn: 展示AI减肥长期效果对比数据
Screen_008.png.description_en: Display long-term weight loss comparison data for AI diet

core_function.cn: 通过对比图展示Cal AI相比传统节食的长期减重效果优势
core_function.en: Show Cal AI's long-term weight loss advantages vs traditional diets

design_highlights.cn: 双曲线对比图直观展示效果差异，红色代表反弹趋势
design_highlights.en: Dual-curve comparison chart shows effect difference, red indicates rebound

design_highlights.cn: 80%用户数据增强可信度和转化说服力
design_highlights.en: 80% user statistic enhances credibility and conversion

design_highlights.cn: 强调6个月后仍保持效果，消除用户对复胖的顾虑
design_highlights.en: Emphasizes 6-month maintenance, addresses rebound concerns

product_insight.cn: 针对减肥用户最大痛点（反弹）进行精准打击，用数据可视化方式建立产品差异化优势，同时暗示传统节食方法的失败，强化用户选择Cal AI的决心
product_insight.en: Precisely addresses dieters' biggest pain point (rebound) with data visualization, establishes product differentiation while implying traditional diet failures to strengthen user commitment

Screen_009.png.description_cn: 收集用户身高体重数据设置公制单位
Screen_009.png.description_en: Collect user height and weight data with metric units

core_function.cn: 收集用户身高体重数据用于定制卡路里计划
core_function.en: Collect height and weight data to customize calorie plan

design_highlights.cn: 极简黑白配色，双列滚轮选择器清晰直观
design_highlights.en: Minimalist black-white theme with clear dual scroll pickers

design_highlights.cn: 公制/英制切换开关方便不同用户习惯
design_highlights.en: Imperial/Metric toggle accommodates different user preferences

design_highlights.cn: 解释数据用途增强用户信任感
design_highlights.en: Explaining data purpose builds user trust

product_insight.cn: 身高体重是计算BMI和每日卡路里需求的关键数据，滚轮选择器比输入框更易用，公制英制切换满足全球用户需求
product_insight.en: Height and weight are essential for BMI and daily calorie calculations. Scroll pickers are more user-friendly than input fields, and unit toggle serves global users

Screen_010.png.description_cn: 选择体重管理目标方向

core_function.cn: 收集用户健康目标以生成个性化卡路里计划
core_function.en: Collect user health goals to generate personalized calorie plan

design_highlights.cn: 极简黑白配色，选中态明确突出
design_highlights.en: Minimalist black-white scheme with clear selected state

design_highlights.cn: 单选卡片式设计，操作直观简单
design_highlights.en: Single-select card design for intuitive operation

design_highlights.cn: 文案清晰说明目标与计划的关联性
design_highlights.en: Clear copy explaining goal-plan connection

product_insight.cn: 通过简洁的三选一目标设定，快速了解用户核心需求，为后续个性化卡路里推荐奠定基础，降低决策成本提升完成率
product_insight.en: Three simple goal options quickly identify user needs, laying foundation for personalized calorie recommendations while reducing decision cost and improving completion rate

core_function.cn: 通过滑动选择器设定用户期望达到的目标体重
core_function.en: Set desired target weight using horizontal slider picker

design_highlights.cn: 水平刻度尺滑动选择器，操作直观精准
design_highlights.en: Horizontal ruler slider for intuitive precise weight selection

design_highlights.cn: 大字体数值显示突出当前选择，视觉层次清晰
design_highlights.en: Large typography highlights current selection with clear visual hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: "Lose weight"标签强化减重目标导向
design_highlights.en: "Lose weight" label reinforces weight loss goal orientation

product_insight.cn: 将目标体重设置独立为单独步骤，配合刻度尺设计让用户感受到精确控制感，同时明确显示"减重"标签帮助用户确认方向，增强目标达成的心理承诺
product_insight.en: Separating target weight as a dedicated step with ruler design gives users precise control feeling, while "Lose weight" label confirms direction and strengthens psychological commitment to goal achievement

Screen_012.png.description_cn: 展示减重目标的可实现性和成功率
Screen_012.png.description_en: Display achievability and success rate of weight loss goal

core_function.cn: 强化用户减重目标可行性，增强信心和动力
core_function.en: Reinforce weight loss goal feasibility and boost user confidence

design_highlights.cn: 用鼓励性语言"It's not hard at all"消除用户焦虑
design_highlights.en: Encouraging copy 'It's not hard at all' reduces user anxiety

design_highlights.cn: 橙色高亮具体数字6.4kg使目标更具体可感
design_highlights.en: Orange highlight on 6.4kg makes goal tangible and specific

design_highlights.cn: 引用90%用户数据增强社会认同和可信度
design_highlights.en: 90% user statistic adds social proof and credibility

product_insight.cn: 在用户设定目标后立即给予正向反馈和社会认同，利用数据背书降低用户对减重难度的心理预期，提升用户完成引导流程的意愿
product_insight.en: Providing immediate positive feedback and social proof after goal setting, using data endorsement to lower perceived difficulty and increase onboarding completion

Screen_013.png.description_cn: 选择减肥速度和每周目标
Screen_013.png.description_en: Select weight loss pace and weekly target

core_function.cn: 让用户选择每周期望的减重速度以制定个性化计划
core_function.en: Let users select desired weekly weight loss speed for personalized plan

design_highlights.cn: 动物图标形象化展示速度等级，直观易懂
design_highlights.en: Animal icons visualize speed levels intuitively

design_highlights.cn: 滑块交互配合动态数值显示，操作流畅
design_highlights.en: Slider interaction with dynamic value display, smooth operation

design_highlights.cn: 推荐标签降低用户决策焦虑，提供专业指导感
design_highlights.en: Recommended tag reduces decision anxiety and provides professional guidance

product_insight.cn: 用树懒、兔子、猎豹三种动物隐喻减重速度，将枯燥的数字选择变得生动有趣，同时「推荐」标签帮助用户做出健康合理的选择，体现产品专业性
product_insight.en: Using sloth, rabbit, and cheetah metaphors for weight loss speed makes boring number selection engaging. The 'Recommended' tag helps users make healthy choices, reflecting product expertise

Screen_014.png.description_cn: 展示AI辅助减重效果对比
Screen_014.png.description_en: Display weight loss comparison with AI assistance

core_function.cn: 通过数据对比展示使用Cal AI能获得双倍减重效果
core_function.en: Show 2x weight loss results with Cal AI through data comparison

design_highlights.cn: 简洁柱状图对比，黑白配色突出差异
design_highlights.en: Clean bar chart comparison with black-white contrast

design_highlights.cn: 2X倍数标识强化产品价值感知
design_highlights.en: 2X multiplier reinforces product value perception

design_highlights.cn: accountability概念建立用户信任
design_highlights.en: Accountability concept builds user trust

product_insight.cn: 在用户完成信息收集后展示效果对比，利用社会证明和数据可视化增强用户对产品价值的信心，提高后续转化率
product_insight.en: Showing results comparison after info collection uses social proof and data visualization to boost confidence in product value, improving conversion

Screen_015.png.description_cn: 识别用户达成目标的障碍因素
Screen_015.png.description_en: Identify barriers preventing users from reaching goals

core_function.cn: 收集阻碍用户达成目标的因素，以提供针对性解决方案
core_function.en: Collect user barriers to goals for personalized solutions

design_highlights.cn: 选项卡片配图标，直观易理解
design_highlights.en: Option cards with icons for intuitive understanding

design_highlights.cn: 单选高亮反馈，选中状态清晰
design_highlights.en: Single selection with clear highlight feedback

design_highlights.cn: 问题措辞引导用户自省，建立解决问题的期望
design_highlights.en: Question wording encourages self-reflection and problem-solving expectation

product_insight.cn: 通过识别用户痛点（如饮食习惯差、时间不足），产品可针对性推荐功能和内容，提升用户感知价值和留存率
product_insight.en: By identifying user pain points like unhealthy habits or busy schedules, the app can recommend targeted features and content to boost perceived value and retention

Screen_016.png.description_cn: 推荐码输入页面，可选择跳过
Screen_016.png.description_en: Referral code input page with skip option

core_function.cn: 收集用户推荐码以追踪用户来源渠道
core_function.en: Collect referral code to track user acquisition source

design_highlights.cn: 极简白色背景配合单一输入框，聚焦用户注意力
design_highlights.en: Minimalist white background with single input field focuses attention

design_highlights.cn: 明确提示可跳过，降低用户焦虑感
design_highlights.en: Clear skip hint reduces user anxiety

design_highlights.cn: 非强制性设计让用户感受到尊重和自由
design_highlights.en: Non-mandatory design makes users feel respected and free

product_insight.cn: 将推荐码输入作为可选步骤嵌入注册流程，既能追踪获客渠道又不影响转化率，体现了增长与体验的平衡考量
product_insight.en: Embedding optional referral code input in signup flow enables channel tracking without hurting conversion, balancing growth and user experience

Screen_017.png.description_cn: 询问用户遵循的饮食类型偏好
Screen_017.png.description_en: Ask user about diet type preference

core_function.cn: 收集用户饮食习惯以定制个性化营养方案
core_function.en: Collect dietary habits to customize nutrition plans

design_highlights.cn: 图标配合选项增强可读性，已选状态对比明显
design_highlights.en: Icons enhance readability with clear selected state contrast

design_highlights.cn: 单选卡片式设计，点击即选中反馈清晰
design_highlights.en: Single-select card design with clear tap feedback

design_highlights.cn: 包容性选项设计尊重不同饮食文化
design_highlights.en: Inclusive options respect diverse dietary cultures

product_insight.cn: 饮食偏好是卡路里追踪的关键维度，提前了解用户是否为素食者等可精准过滤不适合的食物推荐，提升使用体验
product_insight.en: Diet preference is crucial for calorie tracking. Understanding vegetarian/vegan status enables precise food filtering and improves user experience

Screen_018.png.description_cn: 用户选择想要达成的目标方向

core_function.cn: 收集用户使用产品想要达成的健康目标
core_function.en: Collect user's health and wellness goals for personalization

design_highlights.cn: 黑白极简配色，选中态对比鲜明
design_highlights.en: Minimalist black-white scheme with clear selection state

design_highlights.cn: 单选卡片式设计，操作简单直观
design_highlights.en: Single-select card design for intuitive interaction

design_highlights.cn: 目标选项覆盖多维度需求，引发用户共鸣
design_highlights.en: Multi-dimensional goal options resonate with user needs

product_insight.cn: 通过让用户选择具体目标（健康饮食、提升精力、保持动力、身材自信），不仅收集个性化数据，更建立用户对产品的期望和承诺感
product_insight.en: By letting users select specific goals, the app collects personalization data while building user expectations and commitment to the product

Screen_019.png.description_cn: 展示减重目标激励信息和趋势图表
Screen_019.png.description_en: Display weight loss motivation with trend chart

core_function.cn: 展示用户30天体重变化预测曲线，激励坚持使用
core_function.en: Show 30-day weight transition forecast to motivate continued use

design_highlights.cn: 渐变填充曲线图直观展示进度趋势
design_highlights.en: Gradient-filled curve chart intuitively shows progress trend

design_highlights.cn: 积极正向的标题文案激发用户信心
design_highlights.en: Positive headline copy builds user confidence

design_highlights.cn: 基于历史数据的说明增强可信度
design_highlights.en: Historical data reference enhances credibility

product_insight.cn: 在Onboarding结束前展示预期成果，利用目标可视化和社会证明（历史数据）提升用户对产品效果的期待，增强完成引导流程的动力
product_insight.en: Showing expected outcomes before Onboarding ends uses goal visualization and social proof to boost expectations and motivation to complete the flow

Screen_020.png.description_cn: 请求用户评分并展示用户评价
Screen_020.png.description_en: Request user rating and display user testimonials

core_function.cn: 在用户完成信息填写后请求应用商店评分
core_function.en: Request app store rating after completing user info collection

design_highlights.cn: 展示200万用户量和真实用户评价增强信任感
design_highlights.en: Display 2M users and real testimonial to build trust

design_highlights.cn: 使用真实用户减重成功案例激发情感共鸣
design_highlights.en: Real weight loss success story creates emotional resonance

design_highlights.cn: 五星评分交互清晰醒目，用户头像组增加社交证明
design_highlights.en: Clear 5-star rating UI with user avatars for social proof

product_insight.cn: 在Onboarding尾声、用户投入感最强时请求评分，结合社交证明和成功案例，利用承诺一致性心理提高评分转化率
product_insight.en: Requesting rating at peak user investment during onboarding, combined with social proof and success stories, leverages commitment consistency psychology

Screen_021.png.description_cn: 请求通知权限以帮助用户实现目标
Screen_021.png.description_en: Request notification permission to help reach goals

core_function.cn: 请求用户授权推送通知以帮助达成健康目标
core_function.en: Request notification permission to help users reach their goals

design_highlights.cn: 极简白底配合系统弹窗，保持iOS原生体验
design_highlights.en: Minimalist white background with native iOS system dialog

design_highlights.cn: 文案强调目标达成，将权限请求与用户价值关联
design_highlights.en: Copy emphasizes goal achievement, linking permission to user value

design_highlights.cn: 手指表情指向Allow按钮，直观引导用户操作
design_highlights.en: Finger emoji pointing to Allow button for clear guidance

product_insight.cn: 通过将通知权限与「达成目标」关联，将产品需求转化为用户价值主张。手指emoji的引导设计巧妙暗示推荐选项，提升授权率。
product_insight.en: Links notification permission to 'reaching goals', converting product needs into user value. Finger emoji subtly suggests the recommended option to boost authorization rate.

Screen_022.png.description_en: Cal AI app requesting notification permission

design_highlights.en: Finger emoji pointing to Allow button guides user action

design_highlights.cn: 系统原生弹窗确保用户信任感
design_highlights.en: Native system dialog ensures user trust

design_highlights.cn: 滚轮选择器支持流畅滑动选择身高
design_highlights.en: Scroll picker enables smooth height selection

design_highlights.cn: 公制/英制单位一键切换满足全球用户
design_highlights.en: Imperial/Metric toggle serves global users

product_insight.cn: 身高是计算BMI和每日热量需求的关键数据，提供公英制切换体现产品国际化考量，滚轮选择器比手动输入更高效且减少错误。
product_insight.en: Height is crucial for BMI and calorie calculations. Imperial/Metric toggle shows international consideration, while scroll picker is more efficient than manual input.

core_function.cn: 用户选择性别信息以完善个人资料
core_function.en: Select gender to complete personal profile

design_highlights.cn: 极简黑白配色，选中状态清晰醒目
design_highlights.en: Minimalist black-white scheme with clear selected state

design_highlights.cn: 单选按钮式选择，直观易操作
design_highlights.en: Radio button style selection, intuitive operation

design_highlights.cn: 提供Other选项体现包容性设计
design_highlights.en: Other option shows inclusive design approach

product_insight.cn: 性别信息对卡路里计算至关重要，影响基础代谢率估算。提供三个选项既满足功能需求又体现对用户多样性的尊重，平衡了实用性与包容性。
product_insight.en: Gender is crucial for calorie calculation affecting BMR. Three options balance functional needs with respect for user diversity, combining practicality with inclusivity.

core_function.cn: 提供多语言选项供用户切换App显示语言
core_function.en: Provide multiple language options for app localization

design_highlights.cn: 国旗图标直观标识各语言选项
design_highlights.en: Flag icons visually identify each language option

design_highlights.cn: 底部弹出式选择器便于操作
design_highlights.en: Bottom sheet picker for easy selection

design_highlights.cn: 简洁的圆角按钮列表设计
design_highlights.en: Clean rounded button list design

product_insight.cn: 支持8种语言体现产品全球化布局，语言选择采用母语+国旗双重标识，降低非英语用户的认知门槛，提升国际用户体验。
product_insight.en: Supporting 8 languages shows global expansion strategy. Native language names with flag icons reduce cognitive load for non-English users, enhancing international UX.

Screen_088.png.description_cn: 指导用户设置主屏幕小组件的教程页面
Screen_088.png.description_en: Tutorial page for setting up home screen widget

core_function.cn: 引导用户将卡路里追踪小组件添加到主屏幕
core_function.en: Guide users to add calorie tracking widget to home screen

design_highlights.cn: 分步骤卡片式设计配合模拟手机界面
design_highlights.en: Step-by-step card design with simulated phone interface

design_highlights.cn: 分页指示器显示多步骤引导进度
design_highlights.en: Pagination dots showing multi-step guidance progress

design_highlights.cn: 简洁明了的操作指引降低用户学习成本
design_highlights.en: Clear instructions reduce user learning curve

product_insight.cn: 通过小组件功能让用户在主屏幕即可查看卡路里和营养数据，提升App使用频率和用户粘性，将功能融入用户日常习惯中
product_insight.en: Widget feature allows users to view calories and macros on home screen, increasing app engagement and retention by integrating into daily habits

core_function.cn: 指导用户搜索并添加Cal AI小组件到主屏幕
core_function.en: Guide users to search and add Cal AI widget to home screen

design_highlights.cn: 分步卡片展示清晰的操作流程
design_highlights.en: Step cards showing clear operation flow

design_highlights.cn: 分页指示器展示多步骤进度
design_highlights.en: Pagination dots indicate multi-step progress

design_highlights.cn: 模拟真实界面降低用户操作门槛
design_highlights.en: Simulated real interface reduces user friction

product_insight.cn: 通过详细的分步引导和界面模拟，降低iOS小组件添加的学习成本，提升Live Activity功能的使用率，增强用户日常粘性。
product_insight.en: Detailed step-by-step guidance with interface simulation reduces learning curve for iOS widget setup, improving Live Activity adoption and daily user engagement.

core_function.cn: 确认用户是否要永久删除账户的二次验证弹窗
core_function.en: Secondary confirmation dialog for permanent account deletion

design_highlights.cn: 黑色Delete按钮与白色Cancel形成强对比，强调操作严肃性
design_highlights.en: Black Delete button contrasts with white Cancel, emphasizing action severity

design_highlights.cn: 模态弹窗阻断操作流程，强制用户确认防止误删
design_highlights.en: Modal dialog blocks flow, forcing confirmation to prevent accidental deletion

design_highlights.cn: 使用permanently强调不可逆性，帮助用户理性决策
design_highlights.en: Word 'permanently' emphasizes irreversibility for informed decision

product_insight.cn: 删除账户设计平衡了用户自主权和挽留策略，简洁的确认弹窗避免过度挽留造成负面体验，同时二次确认机制降低误操作风险，体现对用户数据的尊重。
product_insight.en: Account deletion balances user autonomy and retention. Clean confirmation avoids excessive retention friction while double-confirmation prevents accidental deletion, showing respect for user data.

Screen_091.png.description_cn: 小组件配置和法律条款设置页面
Screen_091.png.description_en: Widget configuration and legal terms settings page

core_function.cn: 管理应用设置、小组件配置和法律信息查看
core_function.en: Manage app settings, widget configuration and legal information

design_highlights.cn: 小组件预览卡片展示实际效果，直观呈现
design_highlights.en: Widget preview card shows actual appearance intuitively

design_highlights.cn: Live Activity开关提供锁屏快捷数据访问
design_highlights.en: Live Activity toggle enables quick lock screen data access

design_highlights.cn: 清晰的功能分区，小组件与法律信息分隔明确
design_highlights.en: Clear functional sections with distinct widget and legal areas

product_insight.cn: 将小组件预览直接嵌入设置页面，让用户无需添加即可看到效果，降低使用门槛。Live Activity功能延伸产品触达场景，提升日常使用粘性。
product_insight.en: Embedding widget preview in settings lets users see effects without adding, lowering barriers. Live Activity extends product reach to daily scenarios, enhancing engagement.

Screen_092.png.description_cn: 食物营养信息详情页面

core_function.cn: 提供食物条目的举报、删除等管理操作
core_function.en: Provide report, delete and other management options for food items

design_highlights.cn: 下拉菜单采用卡片式设计，层次分明
design_highlights.en: Dropdown menu uses card design with clear hierarchy

design_highlights.cn: 删除选项使用红色警示色，防止误操作
design_highlights.en: Delete option uses red warning color to prevent accidental actions

design_highlights.cn: 营养数据展示清晰，蛋白质30g突出高蛋白特性
design_highlights.en: Nutrition data display clear, 30g protein highlights high-protein feature

product_insight.cn: 提供食物举报和删除功能体现了UGC数据库的社区治理机制，用户可参与数据质量管理，同时30g蛋白质的高蛋白奶昔记录符合健身人群需求
product_insight.en: Food report and delete functions reflect community governance for UGC database, users participate in data quality management, 30g protein shake record suits fitness users needs

Screen_093.png.description_cn: 应用设置和小组件配置指导页面
Screen_093.png.description_en: App settings and widget configuration guide

naming.cn: 偏好设置与小组件引导

core_function.cn: 配置偏好选项并引导用户添加桌面小组件
core_function.en: Configure preferences and guide users to add home screen widget

design_highlights.cn: 底部浮动卡片引导设计清晰醒目
design_highlights.en: Floating bottom card guide design is clear and prominent

design_highlights.cn: 分步骤引导用户完成小组件添加
design_highlights.en: Step-by-step guidance for widget addition

design_highlights.cn: 实时活动功能满足用户即时查看需求
design_highlights.en: Live Activity feature meets instant viewing needs

product_insight.cn: 通过小组件引导将核心数据带到用户手机主屏幕，增加产品曝光率和日活粘性，同时灵动岛支持提升现代化体验
product_insight.en: Widget guidance brings core data to home screen, increasing exposure and daily engagement, while Dynamic Island support enhances modern experience
